title: Tomato, coriander, avocado and feta salad
ingredients: ['8 plum tomatoes, diced', '3 Scotch bonnet chillies, seeded and diced or to taste', '3 bunches spring onions, sliced', '115g herbed feta cheese, crumbled', '4 ripe avocados, peeled, pitted and diced', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '3 bunches coriander, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
